fees.description: May be charged when manually reconnecting or reading your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Incl GST. Fees may vary.
May be charged when manually disconnecting or reading your meter when you move out of a property or change retailer. Incl GST. Fees may vary.
Fee may be charged when manually disconnecting your meter in other circumstances, such as non-payment. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
A late payment fee may be charged when full payment has not been received by the bill due date. This amount is not subject to GST
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Visa debit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to card payments made at Australia Post outlets.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Visa credit cards.
May be charged when manually reconnecting in other circumstances, such as after disconnection for non-payment. Includes GST. Fees may vary
Fee may be charged when remotely reconnecting your meter when you move into a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
Fee may be charged when remotely disconnecting your meter when you move out of a property or change retailer. Includes GST. Fees may vary.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Mastercard debit cards.
The amount is GST inclusive and applies to payments made by Mastercard credit cards.

electricityContract.terms: This offer applies to customers with an applicable network tariff. For solar feed-in tariff eligibility, or for further information about the terms and conditions applicable to this energy offer, please contact AGL on 131 245 or visit agl.com.au. AGL's standard retail contract rates are updated periodically on agl.com.au/src. For solar customers, discounts are applied before solar credits are applied.
electricityContract.variation: We'll vary energy rates no more than once every 6 months. We'll publish variations via a newspaper and our website at least 10 business days prior and give you written notice at least 5 business days prior. Other charges may be varied with notice

timeOfUseRates.description: 1pm - 8pm, Monday to Friday excluding public holidays.
10pm - 7am, Monday to Friday and all day weekends and public holidays
timeOfUseRates.displayName: Domestic Time of Use Off Peak

timeOfUseRates.description: 7am - 1pm and 8pm - 10pm, Monday to Friday, excluding public holidays

greenPowerCharges.description: For .88c / kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 20% of your usage will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.
For 4.4c /kWh inc. GST we ensure energy equal to 100% of your usage will be fed into the grid from Accredited GreenPower generators.

solarFeedInTariff.description: AGL Retailer Feed-in Tariff (exc GST if any)
solarFeedInTariff.displayName: AGL Retailer Feed-in Tariff (exc GST if any)

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: This offer has no contract term
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees and charges may apply. Please see the AGL fee schedules at agl.com.au/fees
